items.sentence: What proof do you have that Tom was the one who stole your mother\'s necklace?
What should we do with people who are very sick or hurt and can\'t get better?
Years ago, when Tom\'s children were young, he used to take a lot of pictures.
They say that girls spend more time worrying about how they look than boys do.
Tom wanted me to tell you that no matter what happens, he\'ll always love you.
Tom wanted to ask Mary to go out with him, but he didn\'t have the courage to.
Tom wanted to give Mary a chance to explain why she hadn\'t yet done the work.
Tom was reasonably certain that Mary had stolen his grandfather\'s gold watch.
I never for a moment imagined that I\'d be able to meet so many famous people.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will eat the sandwich you made for him.
Tom pretended that it didn\'t matter to him that Mary was going out with John.
I can\'t believe you live right here in Boston only a block from where I live.
It\'s so hot outside that I want to spend all day in my air conditioned house.
My grandfather on my father\'s side is celebrating his 88th birthday tomorrow.
My grandfather on my mother\'s side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.
Tom left his parents\' house this spring and has been living alone since then.
It hasn\'t been easy for Tom to earn enough money to support his large family.
Tom is pretty good at baseball, but he\'s not good enough to play on our team.
I was too short to reach the top shelf, so I asked Tom to get the book for me.
Tom isn\'t the only one who thinks it would be a good idea to get there early.
